attributes.title: The most astronomical app ever made!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking it would help me find my fish but instead it gave me a virus that kept sending me Donald Trumps Nudes. I was star struck by how small it was. Like if your going to share them Face-tune it. I can’t believe the confidence he as. I tried deleting the app when my pet T-Rex walked in and saw the photos then tried to eat my screen because he thought it was a piece for shrimp. I got the phone away for him before he ate it but for some reason the photos went away. I was so relieved that I didn’t have to see that little nub again, but it still did not help me find my pet fish. So in conclusion this app is not a reliable source if your trying to find your fish and trump you should really get that looked at. Thank you.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP! STOLE MY IDENTITY
attributes.review:
have🤔you😒ever😔been😡snaked🐍by🙃a🤨 friend👧then😪just😾for 🤦the🗣️clout👀they'll😈do😣it😕again🙄 

i’m really feeling this quote right now thanks this app. i thought me and oompa cheeto were finally going to be able to face time on his cool new app from the apple app store. but as soon as i deleted it, a mini lil huddy hopped out of my phone! 😣 naturally i stepped on it bc it scared me and started saying the n word over and over 👶 then my cat ate it and it turned orange just like trumpy mcdumpy 😭 anyways chile ... the first message i got from this app was to “find nicki minaj put her in the ocean and then call the cops on her for dumping plastic in the ocean” 🤭 first little hoodie now a hate crime against the queen of barbz? 🥺 ✨ b a e i s ✨ basically don’t get this app unless you want a virus and someone to steal ur identity 🤚

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review:
um i literally opened the app and after two seconds i kept getting pop ups of bunker boys shrimp wong 🍤🟠!!! i am so angry thanks to this app i am know legally blind from the horrific images i had to witness 😿. they are forever stuck in my brain being the last things i ever saw 🤢. not to mention MY SISTER GOT THIS APP AND ALL HER LIMBS DETACHED! SHE CANT WALK 👺👺👹👹👺👺🤬🤬🤬!!!!!!!!!!!! this app is so bad and now my family is falling apart (literally)
please never download this for the sake of you and your family this will damage you forever 😔. also his orange skin will forever be implanted into your brain and drive you insane. my dad also downloaded this and now he can’t live without soaking his fingers in boiling water daily 🙄. my mom is the only stable one left besides the constant seizures 😾. i do not recommend 😖💅

attributes.title: WORST APP OUT THERE
attributes.review: Don’t get this app it!!! When you download it it steals all personal information about you. Such as where you live, what room you are in and then worst of all tries to steal your family members. Once the app know where you are it send people to come take your family!!! They will come to the door say they want to sell you the Bible and have free drugs!! BUT THEY ARE LYING 🤥 there are no drugs or bibles. They attacked me with swords and bombs. When they took me to the secret hiding place and once they killed my family they started to make me reenact the crucifixion of Jesus were I was Jesus. I am Catholic and found this so awful and disgusting that I tried once more to run away but guards attacked me with signs that said WHITE POWER. I’m conclusion don’t get this app it killed my family and also #BLM

attributes.title: THIS APP IS ATROCIOUS
attributes.review: At first it was just a plan joke to download this app and see what horrible things awaited me inside. I-I can’t tell you how mentally scared I am fr-from this app(starts crying uncontrollably) I-I’m sorry I am just so-so emotionally scared just seeing (starts crying again) that musty Cheeto on my screen makes me 🤢🤮sorry I’m anyways don’t open this app if you don’t want your innocence stripped away from you . If I could I would give it 0 stars but I can’t I just had to spread my experience with this disgusting no revolting app I deeply appreciate there being a review tap so I can write about this utterly disgusting app why why must I be so curious now I have his revolting face engrained in my memories for years to come. Goodbye my dearest reader and I must thank you for caring about my opinion fair well.

attributes.title: Very offensive! Also disturbing
attributes.review:
This offends me as a Muslim vegan transgender hipster Native-American-lndo-Chinese hybrid alien agnostic-atheist German engineer who vapes fairtrade organic decaffeinated compressed and hydrated extraprotein soy breast milk on the regular and does Hindi Kama Sutra naked crossfit yoga 8 days a week. I'm also a nonbinary trigender genderqueer male feminist and identify myself as a pastafarian pansexual genderfluid Apache helicopter dog of mega multi alpha beta gamma delta omega combo god of hyper death who's in a polygamous polyamorous relationship to the chihuahua which helped me cross the border of 

Mexico because it hates Donald Trump. My dog also walks me to the park and doggy styles me, if you find that weird you're an ignorant arrogant homophobic gender-assuming globaphobic bloodthirsty gun-loving cisgender pansexual bestial sexist racist incestuous white-previlege misogynistic biased obj'ectified raped privileged Nazi-Communist slave owner terrorist lesbian

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD😹😻💩🙈💗✨😈
attributes.review: i opened the app in hopes that i would now be looking at the wonderful donald trump, only to end up seeing a evil cheeto bathing in hotdog sauce. i was so traumatized, my heart started beating so fast i was sent to the hospital. during my hospital visit i figured that maybe mr trump would be on my side, so i opened the app for hope that i would come out okay... only for my phone to then start glitching and playing on repeat the hannah montana theme song as 15 giant cheeto headed frogs came running towards my hospital bed as i was screaming in terror but the only words that could form out of my mouth were “trump 2020”. i felt like i was being possessed... to this day i still see bunker boy in my nightmares rubbing cheese all over his thighs. i think i may start going to therapy soon:(. DONT GET THIS APP! so traumatizing✨

attributes.title: Tryna make me join a Cheeto cult
attributes.review: I opened the app fully aware of my hatred for this idiotic Cheeto. I was IMMEDIATELY bombarded with pictures full of stupidity and Cheetos. I knew I had to get off the app or I would forever be blinded. I looked up from my phone to see my two cats jumping around in a circle chanting “All hail Cheeto man 2020”. I screamed as they started to slowly walk towards me on two legs chanting the same thing. Suddenly all the furniture in the house including the chair I was sitting on turned into giant Cheetos and started to levitate around my cats, which then turned into Cheetos as well. I knew I had to delete the app immediately. As soon as I did it, everything went back to normal so I KNOW it was the app that did this. Idiotic Cheeto, if you’re reading this, no I will not join your Cheeto cult so LEAVE ME ALONE.

attributes.title: Mr Cheetos the killer
attributes.review: So, apparently this app is a cult for Mr Cheetos the killer and i for one do not like Cheetos or killers. When i logged in i saw some weird witchcraft it was four Karens chanting " Cheetos found the manager" I showed my family this video and my dad instantly grew a Karen hair cut, my mom started yelling " I'm being threatened ", my sister and brother both teleported to a Walmart without their masks and said in sync " You are taking out god's beautiful breathing system and stabbing it over and over" and finally my dog grew a big gut orange fur and made a weird sour lemon face and barked maga over and over. I was shocked and now I am writing this all down in an orphanage. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!! But if you do make sure to rate it one star. This app basically killed my family struck them with lightning and now they're walking unread karens.

attributes.title: this app killed my grandma rip granny 💔
attributes.review: Not only did this app take over 24 hours to download while my phone had perfectly good storage and amazing wifi but the ratings were very misleading. After reading the few 5 star rating it’s come to my knowledge that those are just lies. As a mature adult myself it’s my job to give the people what they want and that’s the truth. This app is horrible and a waste of my precious time. I am a busy man and while trying to support our nations leader he only seemed to disappoint me more with this horrendous app. Less than 5 hours after this downloaded my grandmother died and i blame this app!! Its cursed and should be band from every phone who has it downloaded. Bad things will happen if you get this app. This is your last warning. Rip gram gram 🤍
